name: biomni-analyze-xenograft-tumor-growth-inhibition
title: Biomni: Analyze Xenograft Tumor Growth Inhibition
description: Analyzes xenograft tumor growth inhibition data from preclinical studies
content:
Overview

Analyzes xenograft tumor growth inhibition data from preclinical oncology studies. Calculates tumor growth inhibition (TGI), regression rates, time-to-event metrics, and performs statistical comparisons between treatment groups.

Input Parameters

  • data_path (required): Path to tumor measurement data file (CSV format)
  • time_column (required): Column name for time points (days post-treatment)
  • volume_column (required): Column name for tumor volume measurements (mm³)
  • group_column (required): Column name for treatment groups
  • subject_column (required): Column name for individual animal IDs
  • output_dir (optional): Directory for analysis results (default: './results')

Biological Use Case

Critical for evaluating anticancer drug efficacy in preclinical models. Enables quantitative assessment of tumor growth kinetics, calculation of optimal dosing regimens, and prediction of clinical efficacy. Used extensively in oncology drug development for lead optimization and IND-enabling studies.

Output

Comprehensive tumor growth analysis including TGI percentages, growth curves, survival analysis, and statistical comparisons saved to xenograft_results.txt

Category

pharmacology
